attributes.action: Change the Sexual Offences Act so women can be charged with rape against males
attributes.additional_details: Men can be raped by women and this law does not protect men from such violence. In the Sexual Assult Stats & Facts - 2023 data Approximately 12,000 men (aged 16-59) are raped in the UK every year. And it is likely that the number is much higher due to many men fearing to report rape/ sexual violence. To ensure men are protected and help encourage men to report sexual violence.
attributes.background: Change the wording of The Sexual Offences Act 2003 to include both men and women. As men can be raped by women and the law does not address that.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/637887
